summary: Servexa - cleaning service booking website with admin dashboard for managing booking requests
architectural_notes: Admin dashboard at /admin route for viewing booking requests
Booking form for customers to submit service requests
known_issues: Admin dashboard /admin route not loading in Chrome browser - requires proper routing configuration

existing_features.title: Fix the /admin route configuration to ensure the admin dashboard page loads correctly in Chrome browser when visiting https://5t3nc-iiaaa-aaaap-qkmaq-cai.icp0.io/admin
Ensure the admin dashboard displays all booking requests in a table format with columns for customer name, phone number, service type, address, and submission date
Include status toggle functionality in the admin dashboard to allow marking bookings as pending or completed
Add error handling to the admin dashboard to display meaningful error messages if data fails to load or if there are connection issues
